name: Raidraptor - Phantom Knights' Claw
text: When a monster effect is activated: Detach 1 material from a DARK Xyz Monster you control; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then, if you detached a "The Phantom Knights", "Raidraptor", or "Xyz Dragon" card, 1 "Raidraptor" Xyz Monster you control gains ATK equal to the destroyed monster's original ATK. You can only activate 1 "Raidraptor - Phantom Knights' Claw" per turn.
